data.title: Special Education Subject Matter
data.meta_description: This application is for paraeducators who have completed the following: Requirements Completion of the Fundamental Course of Study (FCS) The FCS is one 28 clock hour course. It consists of 12 units of training approved by your employing school district. Enter this into your E-cert account under the professional development section. Under credit type, select Paraeducator Fundamental Course of Study. 20 additional clock hours in Special Education professional development Clock Hour Information Online Clock Hour Resources (PESB) Professional Development Note: The 20 clock hours of professional development can be used towards attaining the General Paraeducator Certificate. Endorsement Note: Individuals who hold a valid regular educator certificate with an Early Childhood Special Education/ Special Education endorsement issued by OSPI may apply once the FCS is complete. Clock Hour Note: Clock hours must be earned on or after July 1, 2019, to meet the additional clock hour requirement. When applying for your certificate, you must submit documentation of completed clock hours or equivalents for review with the application. Apply *If you have completed the Fundamental Course of Study and are ready to apply for this certificate, start by logging in to EDS. *IMPORTANT: Please note that application fees are NOT refundable. Ensure that you select and submit the correct application. If you have questions regarding your application, please contact our office.
data.meta_site_name: Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction
data.text:
This application is for paraeducators who have completed the following:

Requirements

Completion of the Fundamental Course of Study (FCS)

The FCS is one 28 clock hour course. It consists of 12 units of training approved by your employing school district.

Enter this into your E-cert account under the professional development section. Under credit type, select Paraeducator Fundamental Course of Study.

20 additional clock hours in Special Education professional development

Clock Hour Information

Online Clock Hour Resources (PESB)

Professional Development Note: The 20 clock hours of professional development can be used towards attaining the General Paraeducator Certificate.

Endorsement Note: Individuals who hold a valid regular educator certificate with an Early Childhood Special Education/ Special Education endorsement issued by OSPI may apply once the FCS is complete.

Clock Hour Note: Clock hours must be earned on or after July 1, 2019, to meet the additional clock hour requirement. When applying for your certificate, you must submit documentation of completed clock hours or equivalents for review with the application.

Apply

*If you have completed the Fundamental Course of Study and are ready to apply for this certificate, start by logging in to EDS.

*IMPORTANT: Please note that application fees are NOT refundable. Ensure that you select and submit the correct application. If you have questions regarding your application, please contact our office.
